posts.post_title: Wanted 1887 N172 Old Judge Pud Galvin
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tony III
I am looking for a low grade 1887 N172 Old Judge Pud Galvin. I am looking for a PSA 1 or something that will grade as a PSA 1. I need it to complete a set of all time 300 game winners.
Thanks.

posts.post_title: Wanted 1887 N172 Old Judge Pud Galvin
posts.post_content:
Posted By: barrysloate
Tony- I will have a Galvin in my May auction that has a gem photo but because of a slight miscut or trim is in an SGC Auth holder. It might be the perfect card- reasonably priced but with a great appearance.

Of course May is a long way off but you can at least consider it.

posts.post_title: Wanted 1887 N172 Old Judge Pud Galvin
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tony III
Thanks Barry,
Do you think an SGC authenic will cross over to a PSA 1?

posts.post_title: Wanted 1887 N172 Old Judge Pud Galvin
posts.post_content:
Posted By: barrysloate
If it crosses it will be a 6. The card is gorgeous but one border is narrow. But with OJ's you never know. When you see it in the catalog make a judgment call.
